review: This product has changed my life. As a blind person, I was never able to use a smrt TV because many of them were inaccessible. Since Apple has implemented accessibility into all their products, I decied to try out the Apple TV. As I expected, it was easy to use, and I was able to watch my favourite programmes on the internet.
author: Al

review: I just love using my Apple TV. I purchased one a couple of months ago and I still think it was an awesome investment. Whether you own an apple device or not you can still use it for movies, TV shows, and more. If you have considered buying it in the past you should definitely buy this awesome device.
author: Michael D Vaughn

review: Very nice for the price! A lot cheaper than on apple.com

review: Love, love, love. So easy to use and comes with great apps.

review: We purchased two apple TV boxes, and both had to be replaced.  Where is quality control?!?  Two out of 4 were defective and had to be replaced.  Thank goodness Amazon is good about replacing items.
